title: LG K51 Unlocked Smartphone – 3/32 GB – Platinum (Made for US Verizon, AT&T, T–Mobile, Sprint, Boost, Cricket, Metro (Universal Compatibility)
description: A phone packed with premium features that will keep you connected and fit your budget. Introducing the impressive LG K51 that enables you to capture and experience life’s special moments. Take epic panoramas, vistas and brag worthy group shots with the Triple camera system featuring a 115° wide lens. Snap striking photos that let you stand out with Bokeh portrait effect. Immerse yourself in ultimate entertainment and rich media on an expansive 6.5” large display with true-to-life colors. The LG K51 packs premium features and a powerful battery to capture and experience all that life has to offer. th premium features that will keep you connected and fit your budget.
